overview: What is the price of immortality? That’s what Cecile is wondering looking at her last partner sleeping. Some centuries earlier, when she still was a simple mortal, she met a strange man for who sex, blood and a mysterious drug gave him the vampires’ immortality. Immortal herself now, her life became a whirl where men and women share her most perverted games. The receptions where sumptuously dressed men and women abandon themselves to vast sexual practices have replaced the classical cocktails. From the sweet lesbian caresses to the most harsh penetrations, from the expert fellatios to the most ardent sodomies, from elegant female masturbations to frenzied double penetrations, all has became routine. But the desires always satisfied, the pleasure as habit, are they enviable fate?
title: Ritual
